a man who has authored a letter, petition or a book, but not given his name to it.
a letter or a petition written by a person withholding deliberately his or her name .
the condition or fact of being anonymous.
the state or fact of being not known (by name) or famous.
free from diseases; having good health; sound; healthy.
absence of disease; good health; soundness of the body.
a healthy man.
